subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Heath Slocum shot a six-under-par 65 at Torrey Pines Golf Course on Sunday, the best round in a United States Open since Vijay Singh shot 63 in the second round in 2003.
snippet: Heath Slocum shot a six-under-par 65 at Torrey Pines Golf Course on Sunday, the best round in a United States Open since Vijay Singh shot 63 in the second round in 2003.
